use-daily-lvl.name: Use Daily Level
use-daily-lvl.description: Should the mod check for mentions in the <cj>current daily level?</c>

level-id.name: Fixed ID
level-id.description: The level id the mod will look for mentions at

names.name: Names
names.description:
A comma separated <cy>string of names that</c>, if found in a comment, will be considered a mention.

This is so people don't have to type your exact username for you to get notified.

Please note that the @ sign is <cr>not needed</c> for a comment to count as a mention

tags.name: Tags (deprecated)
tags.description:
A comma separated string of tags the mod WILL look for in the comments.

<co>DEPRECATED:</c> This setting was deprecated, and is currently not functional. Please use the "Names" setting instead.
This setting will be removed in <cj>v0.1-beta.3</c>

refresh-interval.name: Refresh Interval
refresh-interval.description: The <cy>interval</c> (in seconds) in which the mod will check for new mentions (default: 5)

history-maxsize.name: Maximum History Size
history-maxsize.description: The maximum size for the <cy>internal mention history</c> (default: 20)
